attributes.action: Investigate distance learning course providers for product and financial mis selling. (after the recent bbc watchdog report Nov 2008).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Have noticed since the bbc watchdog report
on distance learning courses that hundreds
if not thousands of people have been mis sold unsuitable courses and finance packages.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Investigate distance learning course providers for product and financial mis selling. (after the recent bbc watchdog report Nov 2008)."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22845


Prime Minister's Office
